lead_paragraph: Jamie Benn and Jason Speeza scored 80 seconds apart early in the second period, and the Dallas Stars beat the Calgary Flames 2-1 on Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Stars Beat Calgary 2-1 in Their Last Game Before Break
headline.main: Stars Beat Calgary 2-1 in Their Last Game Before Break

snippet: Jamie Benn and Jason Speeza scored 80 seconds apart early in the second period, and the Dallas Stars beat the Calgary Flames 2-1 on Monday night....
